page.title: 12Farming
page.content: {Mr.Price}lives in square 5. He owns 40 cattle and 40 sheep and 55 acres of land.{Mr.Beavan}has got 120 acres in squares 5_6 and the rest is out of the block. He's got a hundred yews, a hundred and thirty lambs and ninety calves. He's got more lambs than anything else.His family has lived there for 11 generations. All his machinery is modern. {Mr.Lennox}of Downton Estate has 15 tractors on his farm. He has 18 men working on his farm. In 1919 over 3,000 acres of the Estate were sold off in various lots . Some of the tenants bought their farms and still own them today. {Mr. Watkins}of Stormer Hall(Square 1) owns 500 acres. He has 300 cattle and 1,500 sheep. He grows barley, oats, wheat, potatoes and mangles.
